name: Dark Tower (itch) (mattpor)
description:
A poor-man's rip off of the 1981 Milton Bradley game, Dark Tower.

This multi-player, home-network game was inspired by the original Dark Tower game.  I've added more monsters and a Strength attribute to the original game.  Otherwise the game pretty much mimics the behavior of the original.  

I originally wrote this simply as a game to play with my kids, but it was so well received that I decided to release it anyway.  

Game instructions are included.  A home network will be required for multiplayer games.  Enjoy!
